thread.section_title: Park South Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Always top notch
thread.title_full: Always top notch - Review of Park South Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Suzan M
title: Always top notch
text: Love this boutique hotel. I've been staying here for years- and not only is the hotel top notch, but everyone who works there is very friendly and helpful. This is the only place I will stay in NYC. The renovated rooms are wonderful (beds so comfortable), the roof top bar with great nibbles menu is perfect on a warm evening (love the gas fireplaces - and view of the Chrysler Building), Covina restaurant is perfect- delicious menu choices! Don't change a thing!
